column5: <think>#Newline			<set var="number1"><star index="2"/></set>#Newline			<set var="animal1"><srai>SINGULAR <star index="3"/></srai></set>#Newline			<set var="legs1">		#Newline				<uniq>#Newline					<subj><get var="animal1"/></subj>#Newline					<pred>legs</pred>#Newline					<obj>?legs1</obj>#Newline				</uniq>#Newline			</set>#Newline			<set var="number2"><star index="5"/></set>#Newline			<set var="animal2"><srai>SINGULAR <star index="6"/></srai></set>#Newline			<set var="legs2">#Newline				<uniq>#Newline					<subj><get var="animal2"/></subj>#Newline					<pred>legs</pred>#Newline					<obj>?legs2</obj>#Newline				</uniq>#Newline			</set>#Newline			<set var="formula"><get var="number1"/>*<get var="legs1"/>+<get var="number2"/>*<get var="legs2"/></set>#Newline		</think>#Newline		<srai>ROUND <srai>WHAT IS <get var="formula"/></srai></srai> legs.

<think>#Newline			<set var="number1"><star index="2"/></set>#Newline			<set var="animal1"><srai>SINGULAR <star index="3"/></srai></set>#Newline			<set var="legs1">#Newline				<uniq>#Newline					<subj><get var="animal1"/></subj>#Newline					<pred>legs</pred>#Newline					<obj>?legs1</obj>#Newline				</uniq>#Newline			</set>#Newline			<set var="formula"><get var="number1"/>*<get var="legs1"/></set>#Newline		</think>#Newline		<srai>ROUND <srai>WHAT IS <get var="formula"/></srai></srai> legs.
